verses.text_plain: Now Hiram king of Tyre sent messengers to David, and timber of cedars, with masons and carpenters, to build him an house.
verses.verse_html: 1Now Hiram king of Tyre sent messengers to David, and timber of cedars, with masons and carpenters, to build him an house.

verses.text_plain: And David perceived that the Lord had confirmed him king over Israel, for his kingdom was lifted up on high, because of his people Israel.
verses.verse_html: 2And David perceived that the Lord had confirmed him king over Israel, for his kingdom was lifted up on high, because of his people Israel.

verses.text_plain: And David took more wives at Jerusalem: and David begat more sons and daughters.
verses.verse_html:
3And David took more wives at Jerusalem: and David begat more sons and daughters. ▼
▼ more: Heb. yet

verses.text_plain: Now these are the names of his children which he had in Jerusalem; Shammua, and Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon,
verses.verse_html: 4Now these are the names of his children which he had in Jerusalem; Shammua, and Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon,

verses.text_plain: And Ibhar, and Elishua, and Elpalet,
verses.verse_html: 5And Ibhar, and Elishua, and Elpalet,

verses.text_plain: And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
verses.verse_html: 6And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,

verses.text_plain: And Elishama, and Beeliada, and Eliphalet.
verses.verse_html:
7And Elishama, and Beeliada, and Eliphalet. ▼
▼ Beeliada: also called, Eliada

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Beeliada: also called, Eliada

verses.text_plain: And when the Philistines heard that David was anointed king over all Israel, all the Philistines went up to seek David. And David heard of it, and went out against them.
verses.verse_html: 8And when the Philistines heard that David was anointed king over all Israel, all the Philistines went up to seek David. And David heard of it, and went out against them.

verses.text_plain: And the Philistines came and spread themselves in the valley of Rephaim.
verses.verse_html: 9And the Philistines came and spread themselves in the valley of Rephaim.

verses.text_plain: And David enquired of God, saying, Shall I go up against the Philistines? and wilt thou deliver them into mine hand? And the Lord said unto him, Go up; for I will deliver them into thine hand.
verses.verse_html: 10And David enquired of God, saying, Shall I go up against the Philistines? and wilt thou deliver them into mine hand? And the Lord said unto him, Go up; for I will deliver them into thine hand.

verses.text_plain: So they came up to Baal–perazim; and David smote them there. Then David said, God hath broken in upon mine enemies by mine hand like the breaking forth of waters: therefore they called the name of that place Baal–perazim.
verses.verse_html:
11So they came up to Baal–perazim; and David smote them there. Then David said, God hath broken in upon mine enemies by mine hand like the breaking forth of waters: therefore they called the name of that place Baal–perazim. ▼
▼ Baal–perazim: that is, A place of breaches

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Baal–perazim: that is, A place of breaches
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Baal–perazim: that is, A place of breaches

verses.text_plain: And when they had left their gods there, David gave a commandment, and they were burned with fire.
verses.verse_html: 12And when they had left their gods there, David gave a commandment, and they were burned with fire.

verses.text_plain: And the Philistines yet again spread themselves abroad in the valley.
verses.verse_html: 13And the Philistines yet again spread themselves abroad in the valley.

verses.text_plain: Therefore David enquired again of God; and God said unto him, Go not up after them; turn away from them, and come upon them over against the mulberry trees.
verses.verse_html: 14Therefore David enquired again of God; and God said unto him, Go not up after them; turn away from them, and come upon them over against the mulberry trees.

verses.text_plain: And it shall be, when thou shalt hear a sound of going in the tops of the mulberry trees, that then thou shalt go out to battle: for God is gone forth before thee to smite the host of the Philistines.
verses.verse_html: 15And it shall be, when thou shalt hear a sound of going in the tops of the mulberry trees, that then thou shalt go out to battle: for God is gone forth before thee to smite the host of the Philistines.

tokens.text: And it shall be, when thou shalt hear

verses.text_plain: David therefore did as God commanded him: and they smote the host of the Philistines from Gibeon even to Gazer.
verses.verse_html:
16David therefore did as God commanded him: and they smote the host of the Philistines from Gibeon even to Gazer. ▼
▼ Gibeon: also called, Geba

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Gibeon: also called, Geba

verses.text_plain: And the fame of David went out into all lands; and the Lord brought the fear of him upon all nations.
verses.verse_html: 17And the fame of David went out into all lands; and the Lord brought the fear of him upon all nations.
